parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create single missions display as a child of given display. The mission dialog will be set to the directory given as an argument "root". </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Display]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> display '''createMissionDisplay''' missionRootDirectoryString  </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display : [[Display]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> string: [[String]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Display]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[Display]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> display '''createMissionDisplay''' [missionRootDirectoryString,cfgMissionsClass] </value></part><part><name>Syntax 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> display : [[Display]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> missionRootDirectoryString: [[String]] - root direction from \Arma 3\Missions\ROOT </value></part><part><name>Parameter 22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> cfgMissionsClass: [[String]] - cfgMissions class to use </value></part><part><name>Parameter 23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[For Type]] </value></part><part><name>Return value 2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ChildDisplay = _Rootdisplay [[createMissionDisplay]] "Tutorial";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> In Arma 3 this would create scenarios UI <code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[createMissionDisplay]] "";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Other options for Arma 3:
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","Cutscenes"];
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","Campaigns"];
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","MPMissions"];
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","Challenges"];
* (findDisplay 46) createMissionDisplay ["","Showcases"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
